product_name: REI Evaporator Ski Boot and Helmet Bag
long_description: Bound for snow? Our REI Evaporator Ski Boot and Helmet Bag will keep your boots and gear secure, protected and ready for those glorious snow days. Main compartment fits a pair of ski boots and a helmet; small pocket on front will take gloves, hat, goggles or other small accessories. Front pocket includes an organizer pocket to keep track of small items. Grommets on bottom of bag allow drainage. Strong webbing handles and a removable shoulder strap ease transport. Adjustable backpack-style shoulder straps offer hands-free carrying; straps stow away when not in use. Our REI Evaporator Ski Boot and Helmet Bag is constructed out of durable 600-denier polyester to last for many seasons.
short_description: Bound for snow? Our REI Evaporator Ski Boot and Helmet Bag will keep your boots and gear secure, protected and ready for those glorious snow days.
